segments.text: Have you made up your mind about not going back to your hometown after graduation ? Where else would you go ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would try to land a job in Beijing . I just want to go to one of the big cities .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: many say more development opportunities can be found there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: that's true . Beijing is the political , economic and cultural center of the entire country .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: well , that's true , but living expenses are also higher in big cities .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've considered that . I'll share an apartment with others to save the rent , and the cost of living won't be too much for only one person .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: one person ? How about your girlfriend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: oh , we had to break up because she didn't want to float around in Beijing . She insisted on working in her hometown and having a stable life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: sorry to hear that . It seems you have sacrificed a lot to work away from home .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: sure have . I want to offer my parents a better life ; so , I'll have to work very hard .
segments.speaker: S2
